Posts.Content: It seems to me the word you are looking for is speculated which means "look into". I had this last year. They told me it was nothing to worry about. I had an ultrasound 6 months later and all was well. By the way, tomorrow I go for my annual mammogram. Hope everything is o.k. Kind of nervous!! The docs told me not to worry. Everything is fine. But you know how it is when you get these tests. Take care
Posts.Title: what does large spiculated lesion mean?
